goals.complete: After Braham notified me of an attack on the Dry Top town of Prosperity, I headed out there to check on Taimi.

goals.active: Check on Taimi in the town of Prosperity.
goals.complete: We found that Taimi was okay, despite the horrible destruction of Prosperity. The upheaval caused by the vines, however, revealed a secret passage behind Scarlet's bookcase. In the tunnels under her room, I found a map tracing her route to some unknown destination to the southwest.
